thread.section_title: www.blazingglass.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of www.blazingglass.com | blazingglass.com
thread.title: Neena

author: Neena
title: Neena
text: We recently purchased a H burner conversion kit and reflective fire glass to update our fireplace. The customer service agent was super helpful on the phone to get me the information I needed for placing my order, selecting the right kind of glass, and then finding the best discounts that were applicable. The order arrived within days, and everything was packaged neatly. Using the instructions included (and those on the website), it took me less than 2 hours to remove the existing parts from my fireplace and install the shiny new reflective fire-glass kit, which we enjoyed the same evening while watching the Oscars. And it was a great deal too!!
